TopicTitle: I need a ksp VERY VERY LOW configuration file

Articles.Content:
So , my KSP doesn't work, when i go to launch the rocket(or vessel) the game crash , so i need the lowest setting (REALLY VERY VERY LOW) for my pc that run in a blue berry (a potato run better , but i dont have money to buy ;-;) please if you had put the download (obviously) down 

 

 

Please i need help

Edited August 29, 2017 by Kerman Jebediah
I'm sorry, but what is it you are asking for?

Specs of the blueberry please.

 It sounds like incompatible GPU or too little RAM, but specs (or a log) will help us help you.
